text.value: This application connects to a shared sample data source, so data may vary due to real-time updates. It's reset daily for consistency but is intended for user exploration, not production use.

disabledState.value: {{components.textinput2.value.length < 1 || components.numberinput5.value < 0 || components.numberinput6.value == 0 || components.dropdown5.value == undefined || components.dropdown6.value == undefined || components.textarea3.value == ""}}

event.message: Unable to remove product. Please review and try again.
The product has been removed successfully.
Unable to add product. Please review and try again.
The product has been added successfully.
Unable to update product details. Please review and try again.

events.message: Failed to update product details! Please check and try again.
Failed to add product! Please check and try again.

options.query:
{{`UPDATE products
SET 
    product_name = '${components.textinput2.value}',
    quantity = ${components.numberinput5.value},
    status = '${components.dropdown5.value}',
    price = ${components.numberinput6.value},
    category = '${components.dropdown6.value}',
    description = '${components.textarea3.value}'
WHERE id = ${components.table1.selectedRow.id}
AND is_active = true;`}}

events.message: Failed to update product details! Please check and try again.

options.query:
{{`SELECT *
FROM products
WHERE
    is_active = true
    AND (
        product_name ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        status ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        description ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        category ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%'
    )
ORDER BY id DESC;`}}
